CustomField.formula: CASE( Priority__c, 'Green', IMAGE("https://connect-customization-5440-dev-ed--c.scratch.vf.force.com/resource/1677461162000/GreenFlag", "Green flag", 50, 50), 'Yellow', IMAGE("https://connect-customization-5440-dev-ed--c.scratch.vf.force.com/resource/1677461162000/YellowFlag", "Yellow flag", 50, 50), 'Red', IMAGE("https://connect-customization-5440-dev-ed--c.scratch.vf.force.com/resource/1677461162000/RedFlag", "Red flag", 50, 50), 'Orange', IMAGE("https://connect-customization-5440-dev-ed--c.scratch.vf.force.com/resource/1677461162000/OrangeFlag", "Orange flag", 50, 50),'' )
CustomField.label: ImportanceColor
